com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

Class BVAdListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.gms.ads.AdListener
      • com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk.BVAdListener

  • public abstract class BVAdListener
extends com.google.android.gms.ads.AdListener
    This class is for setting up ad listeners for each kind of Ad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BVAdListener(Ads ads, com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherAdView adView)
      Sets up an Ad Listener for a Publisher Ad View
      BVAdListener(Ads ads, com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherInterstitialAd interstitialAd)
      Sets up an Ad Listener for an interstitial Ad
      BVAdListener(Ads ads, java.lang.String adUnitId, AdTracker.AdTrackerType adTrackerType)
      Sets up an Ad Listener based on an Ad Unit Id and an AdTrackerType Lets you select from different kinds of ads
